MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the TD7 postcode area of Selkirk, affecting properties in Bleachfield Road and surrounding streets. We did not know in advance there would be a power cut however our engineers have now arrived on site and due to a safety concern with faulty electrical equipment on Curror Street, our engineers had to carry out an emergency shutdown at 6.08pm. This may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by midnight. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 6.51pm on Thursday 4th March 2021.
